beers.title: The Man from Toronto
beers.producers:: Jason Blumenthal, Steve Tisch, Todd Black
beers.description: The plot follows a New York City screw-up named Teddy who is mistaken for the Man from Toronto when the two wind up in the same Airbnb. Antics ensue.

beers.title: Interceptor
beers.producers:: Stuart Beattie, Matthew Street, Michael Boughen
beers.description: One Army captain is forced use her years of tactical training and military expertise when a simultaneous coordinated attack threatens the remote missile interceptor station of which she is in command.

beers.title: Restless
beers.description: After going to extremes to cover up an accident, a corrupt cop's life spirals out of control when he starts receiving threats from a mysterious witness.

beers.title: The Takedown
beers.producers:: Stuart Beattie, Matthew Street, Michael Boughen
beers.description: Ousmane and François are two cops with very different styles. The unlikely pair are reunited once again for a new investigation. What seemed to be a simple drug deal turns out to be a high-scale criminal case wrapped in danger.

beers.title: Ghost Rider
beers.producers:: Stuart Beattie, Matthew Street, Michael Boughen
beers.description: Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze decides to give up his soul to become the Ghost Rider and fight against Blackheart, the son of Mephistopheles, the devil himself.

beers.title: Heropanti 2
beers.producers:: Sajid Nadiadwala, Qaisar Bukhsh, Pramod Kumar
beers.description: A vigilante is sent on a mission by the government to kill enemy troops. However, things go wrong when he's mistaken for the leader of the troops.
